Summary: Small disc shaped object moved across the South-Western sky and into a cloud.
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was walking into our apartment, I noticed a glint in the sky. Having recently seen a strange object over the lake nearby, I decided to stop and take a closer look. I also had my digital camera with me, so I took it out and began taking pictures of the object. The object did not leave a con trail, and I did not hear the usual sound that jets make as they pass over-head. The object moved in a straight line, as can be depicted by the pictures that I took, from the South-Western horizon towards the North-Eastern horizon, where it went behind a cloud. I did not feel any strange reactions to the object, or observe any abnormal reactions in the area around me throughout the duration of the event.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bullfrog
There were no other sightings in Bullfrog on or around June 8th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
